REPORTS OF WORKSHOPS AND SEMINARS (CON'T.)
3
Publ.
Ho.
W-17 NAEB Video Recording Workshop - Cecil S. Bidlack, Editor. Report of the
Video Recording Workshop held in the WTTW Studios, Chicago, Illinois,
May 5~9, 1958> for engineers from educational TV stations operating
kinescope recorders. 195$* 62 pp. Paper. $1.00.
W-l8 NAEBjSeminar on Children's Television Programs - Harold E. Hill, Editor.
Report of the Seminar on Children's Television Programs held at Boston
University, March 29-April 1, 1958, for educational and commercial
broadcasters of children's TV programs. 1958. 37 PP* Paper. $2.00.
W~l8a Children and Television - Eale B. Harris - An annotated bibliography of
articles, reports, books, etc., dealing with the effects of TV on
children. June, 1959* 50 PP* Paper. $1.00.
W-19 Televised Instruction - James S. Mies and Raymond E. Wolf, Editors. Report
of a conference on the use of television in instruction held at Purdue
University, August 25-September 5, 1958. 132 pp. Paper. $2.00.
W-21 NAEB Radio and Audio Engineering Seminar - Cecil S. Bidlack, Editor. Report
of the Radio and Audio Engineering Seminar held at Allerton Park,
University of Illinois, My 27-June 1, 1956, for technical personnel
in NAEB member radio stations. July, 1956. 23 pp. Paper. $1.00.
W-22 NAEB TV Lighting .â€™and Staging Workshop - Hazen J. Schumacher, Editor. Report
of the TV Lighting and Staging Workshop held at the University of
Michigan, August 19-22, 1956, for ETV personnel actively engaged in
lighting and staging work. February, 1957* 10 PP* Paper. 50^.
W-23 NAEB TV Program Planning Seminar - William G. Earley, Editor. Report of the
Program Planning Seminar, for personnel actively engaged in planning of
programs for ETV stations and production centers, held at the University
of Wisconsin, August 26-September 1, 1956. February, 1957* 64 pp.
Paper. $1.00.
W~26 NAEB Research Seminar for Educational Television and Radio - I. Keith Tyler,
Editor. Report of the Research Seminar for Educational TV and Radio
held at Ohio State University, December 9-13, 1957, for research
specialists in educational broadcasting. 1958. 31 PP* Paper. $1.00.
W-27 NAEB Seminar on Instructional Uses of Television and Radio - Elaine Afton.
Editor. Report on the Seminar of Instructional Uses of TV and Radio
held at Purdue University, July 21-25, 1958, for TV staffs associated
with educational broadcasting and educators responsible for training
prospective teachers. 1958. 62 pp. Paper. $2.00.
